column2: Perfect :-) Just what I needed or I could not access arrow up for command history. Using ConnectBot with Samsung Galaxy Ace to access SSH on Ubuntu machine. Thanks 4 job well done

column3: ':' and numeric buttons (may be on a long tap?)

column2: Anysoft != any soft I was puzzled for a while
column3: thinking this would work with any soft-keyboard. It actually needs the keyboard program by "Anysoft" !
